definition: prefix used before the surname of a person or a numeral indicating the order of birth of the children in a family or to indicate affection or familiarity/old (of people)/venerable (person)/experienced/of long standing/always/all the time/of the past/very/outdated/(of meat etc) tough

sentences.english: An older wine should be making progress toward the amber end of the spectrum.
sentences.chinese: 一款老酒應該會變化到琥珀色在色譜的另一端。

sentences.english: Women are like wine, They only get better with age.
sentences.chinese: 女人像老酒一樣，只會越陳越香。

sentences.english: Women are like wine. They only get better with age.
sentences.chinese: 女人嗎，就像老酒一樣，只會越陳越香。

sentences.english: If it's an older wine it will be red, mahogany and even brown.
sentences.chinese: 如果是老酒，那麼就會呈現深紅甚至褐色。

sentences.english: Our company is committed to looking for all kinds of wine, and provide the high quality service.
sentences.chinese: 本司致力尋找各種老酒，並提供高品質的服務。

sentences.english: People also call Shaoxing wine "Aged Wine".
sentences.chinese: 人們又管紹興黃酒叫老酒。

sentences.english: Such as a cache to drink wine for many years, let me slightly tipsy .
sentences.chinese: 如喝了窖藏多年的老酒，讓我略帶醉意。

sentences.english: Such as drinking wine cellars for years, let me slightly tipsy.
sentences.chinese: 如喝了窖藏多年的老酒，讓我略帶醉意。
